title: Update Yes result to single rose-giving stick-figure image with bottom love message + add extra sound triggers

requirements.text: Add additional sound playback to more interactions of your choice using user-gesture-safe playback (no autoplay), while keeping volume low and non-intrusive. At minimum, play a sound when the celebration modal is closed via its close button/tap.

acceptanceCriteria: Closing the celebration modal via user interaction triggers a sound effect (reusing existing audio assets is acceptable).
All audio plays only in response to user gestures (tap/click) and does not attempt to autoplay on initial page load.
Audio remains rate-limited where appropriate and stays at a low, non-intrusive volume consistent with existing behavior.

constraints: Do not modify any files under frontend/src/components/ui (Shadcn components are read-only).
Do not modify immutable hook entrypoints listed in SYSTEM_CONTEXT (compose instead of editing if needed).
Keep all images and audio as static files under frontend/public/assets/generated and reference them directly from the frontend (no backend routing).
Backend remains a single Motoko actor; no backend changes are required for this request.
nonGoals: Do not change the initial prompt text (‚ÄúWill you accept my rose?‚Äù) or the existing Yes/No interaction mechanics beyond adding the requested message/image/sound adjustments.
